operations.summary: Get the list of configured local identity profiles.

parameters.name: numberPerPage
parameters.description: Number of local identity profiles per page.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter criteria limits the local identity profiles that are returned to only those that match it. The filter criteria is compared to the local identity profile name and ID fields. The comparison is a case-insensitive partial match. No additional pattern based matching is supported.

responseMessages.message: PingFederate does not have its IdP role enabled. Operation not available.

operations.summary: Create a new local identity profile.
operations.notes: Create a new local identity profile. If the local identity profile is not properly configured, a 422 status code is returned along with a list of validation errors that must be corrected.

parameters.name: X-BypassExternalValidation
parameters.description: External validation will be bypassed when set to true. Default to false.

responseMessages.message: The request was improperly formatted or contained invalid fields.
PingFederate does not have its IdP role enabled. Operation not available.

operations.summary: Get the local identity profile by ID.
operations.notes: Get a local identity profile with the specified ID. A 404 status code is returned for nonexistent IDs.

responseMessages.message: PingFederate does not have its IdP role enabled. Operation not available.

operations.summary: Update the local identity profile by ID.
operations.notes: Update a local identity profile with the specified ID. A 404 status code is returned for nonexistent IDs.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the profile to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Configuration for updated local identity profile.

parameters.name: X-BypassExternalValidation
parameters.description: External validation will be bypassed when set to true. Default to false.

responseMessages.message: The request was improperly formatted or contained invalid fields.
PingFederate does not have its IdP role enabled. Operation not available.

operations.summary: Delete the local identity profile by ID.
operations.notes: Delete a local identity profile with the specified ID. A 404 status code is returned for nonexistent IDs. Note: If the request succeeds, the response body is empty. If the request fails, an ApiResult is returned with details of the error.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the profile to delete

responseMessages.message: PingFederate does not have its IdP role enabled. Operation not available.

id.description: The persistent, unique ID for the local identity authentication source. It can be any combination of [a-zA-Z0-9._-]. This property is system-assigned if not specified.

source.description: The local identity authentication source. Source is unique.

EmailVerificationConfig.description: A local identity email verification configuration.

otlTimeToLive.description: Field used OTL time to live.  The default is 1440.

verifyEmailTemplateName.description: The template name for verify email. The default is message-template-email-ownership-verification.html.

emailVerificationSentTemplateName.description: The template name for email verification sent. The default is local.identity.email.verification.sent.html.

emailVerificationSuccessTemplateName.description: The template name for email verification success. The default is local.identity.email.verification.success.html.

emailVerificationErrorTemplateName.description: The template name for email verification error.  The default is local.identity.email.verification.error.html.

fieldForEmailToVerify.description:
Field used for email ownership verification.
Note: Not required when emailVerificationEnabled is set to false.

fieldStoringVerificationStatus.description:
Field used for storing email verification status.
Note: Not required when emailVerificationEnabled is set to false.

notificationPublisherRef.description: Reference to the associated notification publisher.

emailVerificationEnabled.description: Whether the email ownership verification is enabled.

LocalIdentityAuthSourceUpdatePolicy.description: Settings to determine whether to store attributes that came from third-party authentication sources.

storeAttributes.description: Whether or not to store attributes that came from authentication sources.

retainAttributes.description: Whether or not to keep attributes after user disconnects.

updateAttributes.description: Whether or not to update attributes when users authenticate.

updateInterval.description: The minimum number of days between updates.
